classes.name: VendorAssessment

Fields.name: operationalDependency
Fields.description: Importance of vendor to Acme's operations scored from 1 to 5

Fields.name: dataSensitivity
Fields.description: Type and volume of sensitive data handled scored from 1 to 5

Fields.name: cybersecurityMaturity
Fields.description: Security controls and certifications scored from 1 to 5

Fields.name: financialHealth
Fields.description: Vendor's financial stability scored from 1 to 5

classes.description: Details about the vendor being evaluated for risk

classes.name: AttributeScoring
classes.description: Scores of the four key attributes

Fields.name: finalScore
Fields.description: Final score calculated as sum of weighted scores

classes.name: RiskLevelDetermination

Fields.name: riskLevel
Fields.description: Risk level determined based on final score

Fields.name: overrideReason
Fields.description: Reason for override if risk level was overridden

classes.description: Determined risk level based on final score

classes.name: RiskScore

Fields.name: score
Fields.description: The overall risk score of the vendor

Fields.name: riskLevel
Fields.description: The risk level associated with the vendor based on the score

classes.description: The calculated risk score of the vendor

nodes.name: VendorAssessment
nodes.description: Input parameter containing details about the vendor being assessed.

nodes.name: AttributeScoring
nodes.description: Scores four key attributes based on vendor assessment

artifacts.bal: if the operationalDependency of VendorAssessment is at least 1 and the operationalDependency of VendorAssessment is at most 5 then set decision to a new AttributeScoring where the operationalDependencyScore is the operationalDependency of VendorAssessment;
artifacts.name: ScoreOperationalDependency
artifacts.description: if the operationalDependency is at least 1 and the operationalDependency is at most 5 then operationalDependencyScore is the operationalDependency;

artifacts.bal: if the dataSensitivity of VendorAssessment is at least 1 and the dataSensitivity of VendorAssessment is at most 5 then set decision to a new AttributeScoring where the dataSensitivityScore is the dataSensitivity of VendorAssessment;
artifacts.name: ScoreDataSensitivity
artifacts.description: if the dataSensitivity is at least 1 and the dataSensitivity is at most 5 then dataSensitivityScore is the dataSensitivity;

artifacts.bal: if the cybersecurityMaturity of VendorAssessment is at least 1 and the cybersecurityMaturity of VendorAssessment is at most 5 then set decision to a new AttributeScoring where the cybersecurityMaturityScore is the cybersecurityMaturity of VendorAssessment;
artifacts.name: ScoreCybersecurityMaturity
artifacts.description: if the cybersecurityMaturity is at least 1 and the cybersecurityMaturity is at most 5 then cybersecurityMaturityScore is the cybersecurityMaturity;

artifacts.bal: if the financialHealth of VendorAssessment is at least 1 and the financialHealth of VendorAssessment is at most 5 then set decision to a new AttributeScoring where the financialHealthScore is the financialHealth of VendorAssessment;
artifacts.name: ScoreFinancialHealth
artifacts.description: if the financialHealth is at least 1 and the financialHealth is at most 5 then financialHealthScore is the financialHealth;

artifacts.bal: set decision to a new AttributeScoring where the operationalDependencyScore is 0, the dataSensitivityScore is 0, the cybersecurityMaturityScore is 0, the financialHealthScore is 0;
artifacts.name: DefaultAttributeScoring
artifacts.description: operationalDependencyScore is 0, dataSensitivityScore is 0, cybersecurityMaturityScore is 0, financialHealthScore is 0;

nodes.name: WeightedScoreCalculation
nodes.description: Calculates weighted score using attribute scores and their respective weights

artifacts.bal: if true then set decision to a new WeightedScoreCalculation where the operationalDependencyWeightedScore is (the operationalDependencyScore of AttributeScoring * 0.3), the dataSensitivityWeightedScore is (the dataSensitivityScore of AttributeScoring * 0.3), the cybersecurityMaturityWeightedScore is (the cybersecurityMaturityScore of AttributeScoring * 0.25), the financialHealthWeightedScore is (the financialHealthScore of AttributeScoring * 0.15), the finalScore is ((the operationalDependencyScore of AttributeScoring + the dataSensitivityScore of AttributeScoring) + the cybersecurityMaturityScore of AttributeScoring + the financialHealthScore of AttributeScoring);
artifacts.name: CalculateWeightedScores
artifacts.description: if true then operationalDependencyWeightedScore is the operationalDependencyScore * 0.3, dataSensitivityWeightedScore is the dataSensitivityScore * 0.3, cybersecurityMaturityWeightedScore is the cybersecurityMaturityScore * 0.25, financialHealthWeightedScore is the financialHealthScore * 0.15, finalScore is the operationalDependencyScore + the dataSensitivityScore + the cybersecurityMaturityScore + the financialHealthWeightedScore;

artifacts.bal: set decision to a new WeightedScoreCalculation where the operationalDependencyWeightedScore is 0, the dataSensitivityWeightedScore is 0, the cybersecurityMaturityWeightedScore is 0, the financialHealthWeightedScore is 0, the finalScore is 0;
artifacts.name: DefaultWeightedScoreCalculation
artifacts.description: operationalDependencyWeightedScore is 0, dataSensitivityWeightedScore is 0, cybersecurityMaturityWeightedScore is 0, financialHealthWeightedScore is 0, finalScore is 0;

nodes.name: RiskLevelDetermination
nodes.description: Determines risk level based on final score

artifacts.bal: if the finalScore of WeightedScoreCalculation is at least 3.5 or the operationalDependencyWeightedScore of WeightedScoreCalculation is 5 or the dataSensitivityWeightedScore of WeightedScoreCalculation is 5 or the cybersecurityMaturityWeightedScore of WeightedScoreCalculation is 5 or the financialHealthWeightedScore of WeightedScoreCalculation is 5 then set decision to a new RiskLevelDetermination where the riskLevel is High;
artifacts.name: CheckHighRisk
artifacts.description: if the finalScore from WeightedScoreCalculation is at least 3.5 or operationalDependencyScore from AttributeScoring is 5 or dataSensitivityScore from AttributeScoring is 5 or cybersecurityMaturityScore from AttributeScoring is 5 or financialHealthScore from AttributeScoring is 5 then riskLevel is High;

artifacts.bal: if the finalScore of WeightedScoreCalculation is at least 2.5 and the finalScore of WeightedScoreCalculation is less than 3.5 then set decision to a new RiskLevelDetermination where the riskLevel is Moderate;
artifacts.name: CheckModerateRisk
artifacts.description: if the finalScore from WeightedScoreCalculation is at least 2.5 and the finalScore from WeightedScoreCalculation is less than 3.5 then riskLevel is Moderate;

artifacts.bal: if the finalScore of WeightedScoreCalculation is less than 2.5 then set decision to a new RiskLevelDetermination where the riskLevel is Low;
artifacts.name: CheckLowRisk
artifacts.description: if the finalScore from WeightedScoreCalculation is less than 2.5 then riskLevel is Low;

artifacts.bal: set decision to a new RiskLevelDetermination where the riskLevel is Low;
artifacts.name: DefaultRiskLevel

nodes.name: RiskScore
nodes.description: Output parameter containing the calculated risk score of the vendor

artifacts.bal: if the riskLevel is High then set decision to a new RiskScore where the score is the finalScore of WeightedScoreCalculation, the riskLevel is High;
artifacts.name: SetRiskScoreAndLevel
artifacts.description: if riskLevel from RiskLevelDetermination is High then score is the finalScore from WeightedScoreCalculation, riskLevel is High;

artifacts.bal: if the riskLevel is Moderate then set decision to a new RiskScore where the score is the finalScore of WeightedScoreCalculation, the riskLevel is Moderate;
artifacts.name: SetRiskScoreAndLevelModerate
artifacts.description: if riskLevel from RiskLevelDetermination is Moderate then score is the finalScore from WeightedScoreCalculation, riskLevel is Moderate;

artifacts.bal: if the riskLevel is Low then set decision to a new RiskScore where the score is the finalScore of WeightedScoreCalculation, the riskLevel is Low;
artifacts.name: SetRiskScoreAndLevelLow
artifacts.description: if riskLevel from RiskLevelDetermination is Low then score is the finalScore from WeightedScoreCalculation, riskLevel is Low;

artifacts.bal: set decision to a new RiskScore where the score is 0, the riskLevel is Low;
artifacts.name: DefaultRiskScore

metadata.name: VendorRiskScoring
metadata.description: A decision service to evaluate the risk score of vendors based on various risk factors.
metadata.summary: Calculates a risk score for vendors based on predefined criteria.
